ai-patthana22.12:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.12:0.3_0: I undertake the forgets, working for what is good,
ai-patthana22.12:1.1_0: Neither principles doesn’t give rise to the teaching. Mindfulness arises dependent on the way.
ai-patthana22.12:1.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities that have no cause or condition.
ai-patthana22.12:1.1_2: Not answering questions. The teaching doesn’t give rise to unaffective cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.12:1.1_5: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana22.12:2.1_0: Not unskillful qualities arise in oneself, or a skillful quality.
